title: Neuroepithelial stem cells - RD_P26 (P10052_108)
growth_protocol_ch1: The iPSC colonies were neurally induced to capture neuroepithelial stem cells (NESCs) (Falk et al., 2012). Briefly, neural induction was achieved by culturing the iPSCs in 0.5 ng/mL hNoggin and 3.3 µM CHIR99021 until day 10. The medium was supplemented with 10 µM SB431542 until day 4. The cells were replated at 40,000 cells/cm2 onto 0.1 mg poly-l-ornithine 1 μg/ml laminin L2020–coated plates in medium containing Dulbecco modified eagle medium/F-12 GlutaMAX, 1% N2, 0.1% B27, 10 ng/mL FGF2, 10 ng/mL EGF, and 1% Pen/Strep.
data_processing.1: Gene expression changes: DeSeq2 package in R (Love et al., 2014)
data_processing.3: Gene annotations: BioMart - Ensembl for gene annotation
data_processing.5: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: Excel files contain the DeSeq2 output for Samples 1-3 compared to the merged control lines (e.g. Sample1 compared to Sample4-6) including gene annotation and statistics
